content: the cat stitch cat hat is purrfect to keep any cat lover warm and cozy this winter season this hat is quick and simple to make and can be made in any size a crochet project you re sure to enjoy includes 2 ways to make this hat - worked flat and sewn together - worked in the round - no-sewing you are welcome to sell the items you make with this pattern but please give me krazy kabbage a mention in your sales listing and provide a link to my website www krazykabbage com i love this yarn medium weight 100% acrylic in any 3 colors you will need crochet hook size i-9 and a yarn needle gauge 12 single_crochet x 15 row = 4 this pattern uses us terminology stitches and terms used chain chain double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet cluster tall double_crochet 2 together stitch in same space
